title: 3 Ways to Contact Snapchat Customer Service

steps.title: Open up the “Support” section in your settings and hit “Contact Us.”
steps.content: Open up the “Support” section in your settings and hit “Contact Us.” Hit the icon that features your bitmoji, followed by the gear symbol, which takes you to the Settings page. Beneath the “More Information” header, select the “Support” option. Then, select the “Contact Us” button.

steps.title: Choose the prompt that best outlines your problem.
steps.content: Choose the prompt that best outlines your problem. Depending on the option you choose, a set of more detailed prompts might pop up to help you more clearly outline and identify the problem. Following the “What can we help you with?” heading, the prompts include: [1] X Research source My account login Report a safety concern My Snapchat isn’t working My Snapstreaks disappeared I have a Filter or Lens question I have a business concern I have a Spectacles question I have a Bitmoji question I have a Snap Store question I have feedback I have a privacy question

steps.title: Go to the bottom of the screen to find the gray bar.
steps.content: Go to the bottom of the screen to find the gray bar. The app may give you some troubleshooting options to help with your problem—scroll past these until you find a gray bar that reads “Need help with something else?” Hit “Yes” to be redirected to a new page. Some prompts from the “Contact Us” page may not display this bar. If you experience this, try choosing a different prompt from the original page.

steps.title: Enter the requested information in the provided form and hit “send.”
steps.content: Enter the requested information in the provided form and hit “send.” Go into more detail about what your specific issue is, and provide any requested information, like your Snapchat username, email, and phone number. Unfortunately, Snapchat doesn’t provide an estimate of when they get back to users. If you’re in a rush, try contacting them on Twitter.

steps.title: Go to Snapchat’s “Submit a request” page and choose an option.
steps.content: Go to Snapchat’s “ Submit a request ” page and choose an option. Some choices, like “I can’t access my account” or “I want to report a safety concern” may ask you to select another option from a more specific list of prompts. Click on the one that best describes your current issue, like: I think my account was compromised I want to report a safety concern I found a bug I want to report intellectual property infringement I can’t access my account I lost my Snapstreak I need help with a Snapchat feature I have a privacy or European Digital Services Act related question

steps.title: Submit the requested information on the following page.
steps.content: Submit the requested information on the following page. Read through the information at the top of the page, and then scroll down to find a submission form where you can go into more detail about your problem. You’ll need to provide your username, email, phone number, and device as well as other info that will help the Snapchat team address your problem. [2] X Research source If you don’t see a form pop up, scroll to the bottom of the screen to find a gray bar that reads “Still need help?” Hit “Yes” to be taken to a submission form. Like with the mobile app, Snapchat’s desktop support page doesn’t provide an estimate for when customer service will be in touch.

steps.title: Direct message @snapchatsupport for help with your problem.
steps.content: Direct message @snapchatsupport for help with your problem. Explain what you’re having trouble with, and wait for a member of Snapchat’s support team to reach out and offer their assistance. If you tweet at Snapchat’s support account, an employee will likely ask you to send a DM instead. It’ll still get you in contact with a customer service representative, though.

steps.title: Locked account
steps.content: Locked account Delete any Snapchat apps or extensions from your phone and log in using this webpage to unlock your Snapchat account . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Lost/stolen account
steps.content: Lost/stolen account Reset your account password and get in touch with Snapchat Support if your account is lost or stolen .

steps.title: Lost Snapstreak
steps.content: Lost Snapstreak Visit Snapchat’s Support website and hit the “Contact Us” button, followed by “I lost my Snapstreak” to get your streak back .
